snippet: Sam, the first openly gay player to be drafted by an N.F.L. team, has told the Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League that he is leaving the team.
abstract: Montreal Alouettes defensive end Michael Sam informs Canadian Football League that he is leaving Alouettes and will step away from professional football altogether.
lead_paragraph: Sam, the first openly gay player to be drafted by an N.F.L. team, has told the Montreal Alouettes of the Canadian Football League that he is leaving the team.

headline.main: Michael Sam Is Stepping Away From Pro Football
headline.print_headline: Michael Sam Is Stepping Away From Pro Football
